¬† This is planned in several steps and is being broadcast under five major global organizations.  As such,
¬† 1. The political section
¬† 2. Religious section
¬† 3. Principles Education Section
¬† 4. Welfare section
¬† 5. The Armed Forces
¬† As.  The above mentioned political section carries out the acquisition of lands by the same country, helping other sectors to stand up to it and the political sectors of those countries.  The fundamental rights for women from the Fundamentalist Religious Section and the burqa for women and all other Islamic peoples are being shared with other religions and other religions.
¬† The Primary Dhamma Education Division also holds classes for Sharia Universities, Schools, and Elderly Agents for small groups.
¬† Provide help to their expansion from welfare sections.
¬† During the war period, genocide is carried out from the armed forces, thereby destroying religious coexistence and the economy of a country.  These human genocide has been continuously carried out from time to time, and is a basic component of this spreading terrorism.
¬† This threat can be suppressed only by crippling all aspects of the system, not by touching it.  The above-mentioned extremist sections are active in Sri Lanka, and in a short period of time, this disaster spread to the patriotic political figures.
